scripts.lint: npm run lint:sol && npm run prettier:check
scripts.test:coverage: forge clean && forge build && FOUNDRY_PROFILE='full_test' EORACLE_CHAIN_ID=42420 forge coverage
scripts.test:coverage:debug: forge clean && forge build && FOUNDRY_PROFILE='full_test' EORACLE_CHAIN_ID=42420 forge coverage --report debug
scripts.test:coverage:report:lcov2: forge clean && forge build && FOUNDRY_PROFILE='full_test' EORACLE_CHAIN_ID=42420 forge coverage --report lcov && lcov --rc derive_function_end_line=0,branch_coverage=1 --remove lcov.info -o lcov.info 'test/*'  'script/*' 'src/examples/*' 'src/libraries/*' && genhtml lcov.info --ignore-errors inconsistent,category --rc derive_function_end_line=0 --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage/
scripts.pre-push: git diff HEAD --ignore-submodules --quiet && FOUNDRY_PROFILE='full_test' EORACLE_CHAIN_ID=42420 forge test  --force --watch-delay 500ms
